EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference in China
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
You're now registered for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming event. Here are the details you'll need:
Event: Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference in ChinaDate: October 15-16 Location: LE MERIDIEN XIAMEN No.7 Guanjun Road , Nanshan Xiamen Fujian 361006 China Reserve your room <[[https://www.marriott.com/event-reservations/reservation-link.mi?id=1565243031726&key=GRP&app=resvlink]]>
Please contact andrew.kirk@honeywell.com <[[mailto:andrew.kirk@honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
